sharedWallets.userInfo.label: Shared Wallet
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.getStarted:
Upload a JSON file to
join a shared wallet

Generate key to take
part in a shared wallet
Shared wallet key copied to clipboard
Choose an option to get started
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.quorum.des: Define the minimum number of wallet co-owners that need to sign each transaction.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.setup.titl: Let's create your new shared wallet
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.setup.subt: Choose a name for the new shared wallet. This name will be defined for all wallet co-signers.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.setup.body: Your interactions with this shared wallet will be associated with the currently active Lace wallet.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.addCosigne: Add co-signers for this shared wallet by entering their individual Shared Wallet Keys and a designated name.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.importantI: When a shared wallet is created its settings, including the keys of each co-signer, are no longer editable. Inputing of incorrect keys may prevent operation of the shared wallet and funds it receives may be unrecoverable.
I understand that upon creating the shared wallet I will be unable to change its configuration
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.shareWalle: Your new shared wallet has been created!
Download and send the wallet setup file to each of the wallet cosigners so they can import the wallet and get started.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.import.sub: Upload your JSON file or click sync to scan the network
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.import.upl: Drag & drop or <Link>choose file</Link> to upload
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.import.err: No shared wallet setup details were found in the uploaded file. Please upload the correct wallet setup file.

This shared wallet setup file does not reference shared wallet key of your currently active wallet. Please ensure the correct personal wallet is active in Lace before attempting to add this shared wallet.
sharedWallets.addSharedWallet.keyGenerat: Enter your personal wallet password to generate shared wallet key within this wallet.
Shared wallet key copied to clipboard
Copy and send this key to someone setting up a new shared wallet. You can review this key at any time.
sharedWallets.transaction.summary.unsign: Confirm details and sign transaction to proceed.
sharedWallets.transaction.summary.unsubm: The transaction can be submitted once all required co-signers have signed. Review the co-signer list and forward the transaction JSON file.
sharedWallets.transaction.summary.title: Transaction
sharedWallets.transaction.summary.validi: The maximum duration a transaction remains valid before it is automatically canceled if not completed with all the required signatures.
sharedWallets.transaction.summary.forwar: Forward the transaction JSON to your chosen cosigner.
sharedWallets.transaction.cosigners.quor: Quorum reached. Transaction ready for network submission.
Additional co-signatures are required before transaction can be submitted.
sharedWallets.transaction.cosigners.unsi: The transaction can be submitted once the required number of co-signers have signed. Confirm details and sign transaction to proceed.
sharedWallets.transaction.cosigners.unsu: The transaction can be submitted as all required co-signers have signed.
sharedWallets.transaction.coSign.importJ: Drag & drop or <Link>choose file</Link> to upload
